pr_title: PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE CHANGE: Run Windows too by default

timeline.message: CHANGE PR TEMPLATE: Run Windows too by default
CHANGE PR TEMPLATE: Run Windows too by default
CHANGE PR TEMPLATE: Run Windows too by default

timeline.bodyText: Is it good to work with double negation of no win?
timeline.author: ochaloup
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,4 +6,4 @@ Please make sure your PR meets the following requirements:
 
 The build axis can be controlled by prefixing a ! on the following as appropriate.
 
-MAIN TOMCAT AS_TESTS RTS JACOCO XTS QA_JTA QA_JTS_JACORB QA_JTS_JDKORB QA_JTS_OPENJDKORB BLACKTIE PERF LRA NO_WIN DB_TESTS mysql db2 postgres oracle
+MAIN TOMCAT AS_TESTS RTS JACOCO XTS QA_JTA QA_JTS_JACORB QA_JTS_JDKORB QA_JTS_OPENJDKORB BLACKTIE PERF LRA !NO_WIN DB_TESTS mysql db2 postgres oracle

replies.bodyText: Good question. I would not object to it being changed to WIN and !WIN but I am not sure if we necessarily need to do that. Thanks for looking!
replies.author: tomjenkinson

replies.bodyText: I see, fair enough. I don't count the current state for a big issue.
replies.author: ochaloup
